Package pl.edu.agh.kis.lab.pz1.game_logic.texas

Record Class Card

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
pl.edu.agh.kis.lab.pz1.game_logic.texas.Card
Record Components:
rank - the rank of the card (e.g., ACE, KING, etc.)
suit - the suit of the card (e.g., HEARTS, SPADES, etc.)
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Card>
public record Card(Card.Rank rank, Card.Suit suit) extends Record implements Comparable<Card>
Represents a playing card with a rank and suit. This class is immutable and implements Comparable to allow comparison by rank.

    Enum representing the thirteen ranks in a standard deck of playing cards.
    static enum 
    Card.Suit
    Enum representing the four suits in a standard deck of playing cards.
